class="p">[</span><span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">exports</span><span class="p">){</span>

</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-2" id="section-2">&#182;</a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
  <div class="summary"><p>This is the main entry point of the game. We <code>require</code> Phaser as
well as all of our states and add those states to the <code>game</code>.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="body"><p>Finally, we start the <code>boot</code> state which kicks off the game.</p>
  </div>
</div>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>



</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-3" id="section-3">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>Get a handle to Phaser!
Note that the phaser lib is not actually part of this project anywhere.
Instead, we're using the CDN copy of phaser via <code>browserify-shim</code>.
You'll see a reference to the CDN copy in <code>index.html</code>.</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">);</span>


</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-4" id="section-4">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>Create a new instance of phaser</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">game</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Game</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">480</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">320</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">AUTO</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;content&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">);</span>


</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-5" id="section-5">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>Bring in all of our states via <code>require</code> calls.</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">boot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./state/boot.js&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">preloader</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./state/preloader&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">mainMenu</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./state/mainMenu&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">level1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./state/level1&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">splash</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./state/splash&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>



</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-6" id="section-6">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>Add all of our states to the Phaser game instance.</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
<span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;boot&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">boot</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;splash&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">splash</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;preloader&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">preloader</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;mainMenu&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">mainMenu</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;level1&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">level1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>



</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-7" id="section-7">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>Kick off the game by starting up the <code>boot</code> state</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
<span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">start</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;boot&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>

</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-8" id="section-8">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>See <a href="state/boot.js.html">boot.js</a> for the next step.</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
<span class="p">},{</span><span class="s2">&quot;./state/boot.js&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;./state/level1&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;./state/mainMenu&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;./state/preloader&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;./state/splash&quot;</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">}],</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">exports</span><span class="p">){</span>

<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="nx">Boot</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">prototype</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">preload</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>

</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-9" id="section-9">&#182;</a>

<p>the preloader images</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
  <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">load</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;loadingBar&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;assets/preloader_loading.png&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">load</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;phaserLogo&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;assets/phaser-logo.png&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

<span class="nx">Boot</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">prototype</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">create</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">game</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">;</span>


</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-10" id="section-10">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>max number of fingers to detect
unless you specifically know your game needs to support multi-touch I would recommend setting this to 1</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
  <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">input</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">maxPointers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>


</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-11" id="section-11">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>auto pause if window loses focus
Phaser will automatically pause if the browser tab the game is in loses focus. You can disable that here:</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
  <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">disableVisibilityChange</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">device</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">desktop</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>

</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-12" id="section-12">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>If you have any desktop specific settings, they can go in here</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">pageAlignHorizontally</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>

</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-13" id="section-13">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>Same goes for mobile settings.
In this case we're saying "scale the game, no lower than 480x260 and no higher than 1024x768"</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scaleMode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">StageScaleMode</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">SHOW_ALL</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">minWidth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">480</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">minHeight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">260</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">maxWidth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1024</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">maxHeight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">768</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">forceLandscape</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">pageAlignHorizontally</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">stage</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">scale</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setScreenSize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>


</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-14" id="section-14">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>By this point the preloader assets have loaded to the cache, we've set the game settings
So now let's start the real preloader going</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
  <span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">start</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;splash&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">};</span>
<span class="p">},{}],</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">exports</span><span class="p">){</span>
<span class="cm">/* globals module, require, localStorage*/</span>

<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">);</span>


<span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">exports</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="nx">create</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>

<div class="pilwrap" id="startgame">
  <h2>
    <a href="#startgame" name="startgame" class="pilcrow">&#182;</a>
    startGame
  </h2>
</div>


<p>Starts up the game!</p>
  </div>
  <div class="body">
  </div>
  <div class="details">
    <div class="dox_tag_title">Returns</div>
    <div class="dox_tag_detail">
      <span class="dox_tag_name"></span>
      <span class="dox_type">Phaser.Game</span>
      <span>returns a new instance of Phaser.Game</span>
    </div>
  </div>

  <span class="p">}</span>

<span class="p">};</span>
<span class="p">},{}],</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">exports</span><span class="p">){</span>
<span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">);</span>

<span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">exports</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>

    <span class="nx">preload</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>

        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">loadingBar</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">sprite</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">world</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">centerX</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">world</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">centerY</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;loadingBar&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">loadingBar</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">anchor</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">loadingBar</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">anchor</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">load</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setPreloadSprite</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">loadingBar</span><span class="p">);</span>

        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">load</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">image</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;menu_background&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;assets/menu_background.png&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">load</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">spritesheet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;game_sprites&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;assets/game_sprites.png&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">32</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">32</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="p">},</span>

    <span class="nx">create</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">tween</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">tween</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">loadingBar</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">to</span><span class="p">({</span>
            <span class="nx">alpha</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
        <span class="p">},</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">Phaser</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Easing</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Linear</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="nx">tween</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">onComplete</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">startMainMenu</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">},</span>

    <span class="nx">startMainMenu</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">start</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;mainMenu&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

<span class="p">};</span>
<span class="p">},{}],</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nx">exports</span><span class="p">){</span>
<span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">exports</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Splash</span><span class="p">;</span>

<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nx">Splash</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">logo</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="nx">Splash</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">prototype</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">create</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">midx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">world</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">centerX</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">midy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">world</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">centerY</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">logo</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">logo</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">sprite</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">midx</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">midy</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;phaserLogo&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">logo</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">anchor</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setTo</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">logo</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">fadeIn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">tween</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">logo</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">hold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">tween</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">logo</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">fadeOut</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">tween</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">logo</span><span class="p">);</span>


</pre></div>
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
<div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-16" id="section-16">&#182;</a>
</div>
<p>fade in and slightly move up, hold for a half sec, then fade out</p>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"><div class="highlight"><pre>
  <span class="nx">fadeIn</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">to</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="nx">alpha</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">y</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="nx">midy</span>
  <span class="p">},</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="nx">hold</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">to</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="nx">alpha</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
  <span class="p">},</span> <span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="nx">fadeOut</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">to</span><span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="nx">alpha</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
  <span class="p">},</span> <span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="nx">fadeIn</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">chain</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">hold</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">hold</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">chain</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">fadeOut</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">fadeIn</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">start</span><span class="p">();</span>

  <span class="nx">fadeOut</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">onComplete</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">add</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">game</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">start</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;preloader&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">},</span> <span class="k">this</span><span class="p">);</span>

<span class="p">};</span>
<span class="p">},{}]},{},[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
